title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When changing the project properties to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location, the classpath and output location settings are not updated together.
EB: When changing the project properties to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location, the classpath and output location settings should be updated together.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location.
2. In the project properties, change the settings to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
